Title: Drupal Anonymous Open Redirect
Description: Drupal core and contributed modules frequently use a "destination" query string parameter in URLs to redirect users to a new destination after completing an action on the current page. Under certain circumstances, malicious users can use this parameter to construct a URL that will trick users into being redirected to a 3rd party website, thereby exposing the users to potential social engineering attacks.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.5.8, all versions starting from 8.6.0 before 8.6.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.5.8 before 8.6.0, all versions starting from 8.6.2
